EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-C0004O-Finance.Email 14_TCO Analysis Offer
EmailTemplate.subject: Special limited time offer: Free TCO analysis
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Free TCO analysis for your business Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Understanding your Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) can change the game for enterprises considering an OpenStack private cloud migration.
To ensure you have full visibility of all costs, we would like to provide a free cost analysis of your environment. This special offer is only available until June 30, 2018.
To take advantage of this limited time offer, contact your Nokia account representative, or channel partner. If contact information is unavailable, just click the ‘Contact us <[[https://pages.nokia.com/C0004O-ContactUs.html?did=d000000000ar&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email 14b-tcooffer&utm_term=finance]]>’ button and we’ll be happy to get back to you.
I look forward to hearing from you! Michael Williams
Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
